  {
    "file_path": "h2q_project/test_quaternion_ops.py",
    "content": "import pytest
import numpy as np
from h2q_project.quaternion_ops import quaternion_conjugate, quaternion_multiply, quaternion_to_rotation_matrix


def test_quaternion_conjugate():
    q = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
    q_conj = quaternion_conjugate(q)
    assert np.allclose(q_conj, [1, -2, -3, -4])


def test_quaternion_multiply():
    q1 = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
    q2 = np.array([5, 6, 7, 8])
    q_mult = quaternion_multiply(q1, q2)
    expected_result = np.array([-60,  12,  30,  24])
    assert np.allclose(q_mult, expected_result)


def test_quaternion_to_rotation_matrix():
    q = np.array([1, 0, 0, 0])  # Identity quaternion
    rotation_matrix = quaternion_to_rotation_matrix(q)
    identity_matrix = np.eye(3)
    assert np.allclose(rotation_matrix, identity_matrix)

    q = np.array([0.7071068, 0.7071068, 0, 0]) # Rotation of 90 degrees around x-axis
    rotation_matrix = quaternion_to_rotation_matrix(q)
    expected_matrix = np.array([[ 1.        ,  0.        ,  0.        ],
                               [ 0.        ,  0.        , -1.        ],
                               [ 0.        ,  1.        ,  0.        ]])

    assert np.allclose(rotation_matrix, expected_matrix)
"
